explanation.part1: The goal of a Sudoku puzzle is to fill the 9 x 9 grid so that each
explanation.part4: contains all numbers from 1 to 9 without repetition.

instructions.step2: Which number fits in the cell?
instructions.step3: The number 5 fits perfectly in the cell

notes.title: Using Notes
notes.explanation: Notes visualize possibilities and transform complex Sudokus into solvable strategy tasks.
